Hola, Belal Ehmed here, an indie game developer digging the binary trenches.

I am a problem solver at heart, whether its games, apps, puzzles or algorithms. I enjoy tackling complex problems by breaking them down into smaller manageable pieces.

When I am not writing code I enjoy drawing, playing video games, solving metal puzzles or making something out of play dough.

I love to learn new tools through self-study and online courses. I am always exploring creative ideas and I share them with colleagues and online developer communities.

Currently, I am working at Binex Solutions on mobile games and applications in Unity3D, iOS and Android.

I would love for you to have a look at my work and the side projects I have been working on.

I love talking to fellow geeks and hearing what's up! Drop me a line at belalehmed@gmail.com.

“Nothing is more fatiguing as the eternal hanging on of an uncompleted task.” William James
